name: Anomaly in "Average LAST Ready for Review to LAST In Review cycle time" where "IssueType" is "Bug"
query:
SELECT "IssueType", AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review'))))
	-(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))))
   ) AS "Average LAST Ready for Review to LAST In Review cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500
description: Metric "Average LAST Ready for Review to LAST In Review cycle time" is 7.64% higher than mean where "IssueType" is "Bug"
signalFragment:
SELECT "IssueType", AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Review'))))
	-(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))))
   ) AS "Average LAST Ready for Review to LAST In Review cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500
origin: ../data/From_API/Solutions Demo Workspace/[00]_PIA Jira Process/investigations/Placeholder Group 4 - LYTH_2024-02-01.json
parser_values: ["500", "Change Status to In Review", "Change Status to Ready for Review", "2", "IssueType", "1"]
